title: A Curse of Twisted Fates
description: She’s running from her past. They’re trapped by their curse. Only her magic can save them—if they don’t break her first.Everest has spent the last year on the run, hunted for her magic by the same people who murdered her parents. When she arrives in Haven, middle-of-nowhere Virginia, she hopes to finally find some answers and maybe a small sliver of peace. It’s just her luck that her new house is haunted by ghosts who will stop at nothing to make her leave.Hudson, August, and Casimir have been trapped as ghosts for ten years, and each new resident weakens them further, pushing them closer to a fate worse than death. With only one month left to break their curse and recover their bodies, they should be desperate to get rid of Everest. But even at the risk of losing their souls, they can’t seem to let her go.As riddles unravel and enemies close in, it becomes clear their fates are intertwined in ways none of them could have imagined. But if they can’t trust each other, even fate might not be enough to save them.A Curse of Twisted Fates is the first book in a slow-burn PNR Reverse Harem series and will end on a cliffhanger.
author: Solace Rae
